posts.post_text: January 13, 2018 at 2:09 PM#2I seem find out the way.Not sure 100% sure.It should enable TC slot X and Timecode which respose to TC Slot X.So far what I  did is Select Tomecode and play first.Then press the macro:a. Go TimecodeSlot (TC Slot ?)b. Midinote 1.1 127 --->trigger Qlab sound trackIt should be more efficiency to combine:Select Timecode  and Play.If any efficiency way will appreciate.Vincent

title: How to enable clock play in timecode mode
